sections.name: Introduction/Landing Page
sections.description: Full-screen introduction section featuring the animated logo with subtle colorful particles

logo.description: Animated Levenim MT font logo that serves as the focal point of the landing page

modifiable.notes: Logo animation can be updated but must remain as the central element

particles.description: Subtle colorful particles that follow cursor movement

modifiable.notes: Particle colors and density can be adjusted but should remain subtle and interactive

sections.structureNotes: This section must remain full-screen and centered

sections.name: Scroll Animation Section
sections.description: Section with right-aligned animation activated by scrolling, and left-aligned text block

animation.description: Animation composed of frames that change as user scrolls

modifiable.notes: Animation frames can be replaced but scroll mechanism must remain
Text content can be replaced but block must remain

sections.structureNotes: Animation must remain right-aligned with text on the left

sections.name: Project Display 1
sections.description: Project display with alternating image and text blocks, images extend to screen edges

image.description: Left-aligned project image that extends to left screen edge
Right-aligned project detail image that extends to right screen edge

text.description: Left-aligned text with additional project details

sections.structureNotes: Must maintain alternating layout pattern with images extending to screen edges

sections.name: Full-Width Project
sections.description: Screen-sized image with explanation text below, image extends to both screen edges

image.description: Full-width project image that extends to both screen edges

sections.structureNotes: Image must remain full-width with centered text below

sections.name: Project Display 2
sections.description: Second project display with alternating image and text blocks, images extend to screen edges

image.description: Left-aligned project image that extends to left screen edge
Right-aligned project detail image that extends to right screen edge

text.description: Left-aligned text with additional project details

sections.structureNotes: Must maintain alternating layout pattern with images extending to screen edges

sections.name: Interactive Media Section
sections.description: Centered image that plays video on hover, this image does NOT extend to edges

media.description: Image that plays video when hovered

modifiable.notes: Media files can be replaced but hover interaction must remain

sections.structureNotes: Media must remain centered with interaction on hover, and NOT extend to edges

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Page footer with copyright and social links

modifiable.notes: Links can be added, removed or modified

sections.structureNotes: Footer must remain at the bottom of the page

maintainStructure: Keep the core layout patterns for each section
Preserve the animation and interaction mechanisms
All image sections except the last one must extend to screen edges
The interactive media section must NOT extend to screen edges

edgeExtension.rule: All images except in the interactive section must extend to screen edges based on their position
edgeExtension.left: Left-aligned images extend to left screen edge
edgeExtension.right: Right-aligned images extend to right screen edge
edgeExtension.full: Full-width images extend to both edges

text.heading: Should be concise and descriptive
text.paragraphs: Should be clear and professional, focusing on project details
text.length: Keep paragraphs brief for better readability

videos.duration: Keep under 10 seconds for hover interactions
videos.autoplay: Only on hover, should not autoplay otherwise

particles.style: Subtle colorful individual particles without connecting lines
particles.interactivity: Should follow cursor movement and respond to clicks
